Enum SFDCAccessControlException.ExceptionType

Enclosing class:
SFDCAccessControlException

ExceptionType - this enum defines the different types of access control exceptions.

Enum Constant Summary
FIELD_ACCESS_VIOLATION
          This error type is a field level access violation.
GENERIC
          This error is a generic error type.
NO_RECORD_FOUND
          This error type is a generic record not found error.
FIELD_NOT_FOUND
          This error type is a generic field not found error.
OBJECT_ACCESS_VIOLATION
          This error type is an object level access violation.
SHARING_ACCESS_VIOLATION
          This error type is a sharing access violation.
 
Enum Constant Detail

GENERIC

public static final SFDCAccessControlException.ExceptionType GENERIC
This error is a generic error type.

OBJECT_ACCESS_VIOLATION

public static final SFDCAccessControlException.ExceptionType OBJECT_ACCESS_VIOLATION
This error type is an object level access violation.

FIELD_ACCESS_VIOLATION

public static final SFDCAccessControlException.ExceptionType FIELD_ACCESS_VIOLATION
This error type is a field level access violation.

SHARING_ACCESS_VIOLATION

public static final SFDCAccessControlException.ExceptionType SHARING_ACCESS_VIOLATION
This error type is a sharing access violation.

NO_RECORD_FOUND

public static final SFDCAccessControlException.ExceptionType NO_RECORD_FOUND
This error type is a generic record not found error. This can be due to record does not exist, sharing violation, or other errors.

FIELD_NOT_FOUND

public static final SFDCAccessControlException.ExceptionType FIELD_NOT_FOUND
This error type is a generic field not found error.
